main event: A police officer in Corvallis, Oregon observed a bright object in the night sky.
interesting points: The object was described as being very bright and larger than a shooting star., The officer observed a greenish yellow-orange tail with sparks flying from it., The sighting lasted about 3 to 4 seconds., The object dropped behind a house and disappeared from view., The sighting was also confirmed by the officer's wife.
sighted object: a bright object with a greenish yellow-orange tail
witness description: a police officer and his wife
